job.title: Site reliability Engineer
job.description: <strong><u>Preferred Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li>DevOps Experience</li><li> Public Cloud Experience (Microsoft Azure)</li><li>Container Concepts (Docker)</li><li>Orchestration (Kubernetes)</li><li>Source Control (GitHub, Bitbucket, Azure Repos etc)</li><li>Continuous Integration ( Azure Pipelines, Jenkins, Bamboo etc)</li><li>Continuous Deployment (Azure DevOps, Jenkins etc)</li><li>Experience with infrastructure automation tools (Terraform, Packer, Puppet, Ansible etc)</li><li>Scripting Experience (Python, Ruby, Bash, Shell, Node.js)</li><li>Security and Network awareness</li><li>Product Mindset</li><li>Learnability</li><li>Self Motivated</li><li>Experience in Agile methodologies</li><li>Experience working with global teams</li><li> Good communication &amp; interpersonal skills<br></li></ul><strong><u>Minimum Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li>5 years of IT industry experience with a Bachelor's/Master's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent</li><li>Strong Software Engineering Principles</li><li>Product Company Experience</li></ul>
